SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TicketCategorie] ( [TicketCategorie_Ky] smallint IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [TicketCategorie_Titolo] varchar(200) NULL , [TicketCategorie_Padre] int NULL , [TicketCategorie_UserInsert] int NULL , [TicketCategorie_UserUpdate] int NULL , [TicketCategorie_UserDelete] int NULL , [TicketCategorie_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [TicketCategorie_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [TicketCategorie_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[TicketCategorie] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_TicketCategorie PRIMARY KEY ([TicketCategorie_Ky])
